title: client issues please help ASAP
body:
i have a few gyazo links to share that will make this easier to explain. But i have this recurring issue where i open the client, i'm presented with a message saying i need install an older version, my only option is click okay. Once i do so, the client immediately prompts me to restart it so it could try and repatch itself. from that point i either open the client and get the first message again or im greeted with this lovely empty patcher box. i cant even log in or click the cogwheel. I've already utilized the hextech repair tool and got all the logs saved. i tried submitting them in a ticket to riot support but I've yet to get a response.  i have also tried doing the "set the time and date back by 1" thing. At this point im pretty much begging someone who had this issue and resolved it to help me out. thank you

gyazo links:
1) https://gyazo.com/517556e84375164114c7de92e580089f
2) https://gyazo.com/57951525d8b6c0af11327332feea4ca0
3) https://gyazo.com/1851f68056de9e7dd5a9051084d3825e

it almost feels like the 3rd pic is mocking me.

replies.body: Ummmmm, ever since i downloaded this patch every time i go to start a game when i enter the loading screen it is pure black, im unable to do anything, to shut down the computer, switch programs, etc. All i can see is my mouse. What should I do. Around the time this started i also downloaded the PBE and it said that it would take 4000 minutes to do. The PBe thing may be irrelevant but I really want to play some league.

Hey there, you might have some overzealous security settings or anti-virus that's blocking your game files and install from updating properly.  Start off with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed, and let me know if that helps.
Porocles im having a problem with the reconnect issue after champ select ive tried everything and nothings working ive also sent a ticket but got no reply in 24 hours

Hey Waifu Ahri, this can happen if your network is getting blocked from transitioning over to the game server.  If you haven't already, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should fix that up.  Do test it in customs first!

ive tried all of that nothing worked, i just reinstalled the game and it took a long time to download on the play button , then after it finshed doing that it actually worked i was able to get in game and play in a custom then i needed to reboot my computer and know i have the same problem again how{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Thanks for the follow up, sorry for all this trouble.  :(  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case to grab some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will check this out with you and find some options through your ticket.

hello and thank you for reaching out! before i was able to read your response i uninstalled and tried to reinstall the game. however this time i get an error about a file. I've provided another gyazo link

https://gyazo.com/90be12ea08ffb15cd0b977f1c0ab204b
Yeah, this further affirms a possible issue where something is preventing your files from being read or installed correctly.  Make sure to go over those steps!
one more thing, i had already installed and played on patch 7.20. all of this literally started happening this morning when i tried logging in.
